Class Management

  • java.lang.Object
    • Employee
      • Fulltime
        • Management

  • public class Management
extends Fulltime
    Extension of Employee and Fulltime classes. Allows creation of a management employee with specific bonuses and roles provided.
    Author:
    Craig Li, Prerak Patel

      • getRole

        public int getRole()
        Gets the management role of a management employee.
        Returns:
        role The role of the management employee.

      • setRole

        public void setRole(int role)
        Sets the management role of a management employee,and its additional compensation.
        Parameters:
        role - The management role to set.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a formatted string that displays a management employee's information. Includes management title, as well as additional management compensation.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Fulltime
        Returns:
        employeeInfo formatted string containing information about the given management employee.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Checks to see if a given object has the same profile as a managment employee.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Fulltime
        Parameters:
        obj - Object whose profile is compared to a manager's profile.
        Returns:
        true if the object is a Management employee, false if not.
